attributes.action: take control of the biased news reportings from the BBC
attributes.background: It is becoming very more clear that the BBC report on what best suits there agenda and who are in direct link with the BBC, they deam what is relevant and what is not. This system of reporting is causing fear and turmoil amongst the nation. Whilst true news is been ignored. We want unbiased news !!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
